pr_title: Fixes #3355 : Do not display pins at all when "Needs Photo" is selected

timeline.message: NearbyParentFragment: changing function name and description

timeline.bodyText:
As mentioned in your comment you're just hiding the pins rather than removing them. So, wouldn't it be better to name this hideAllMarkers?
Since we're there. I also think the All part of the name is misleading as it gives the person reading the code the incorrect idea that we would be hiding all the marker while we're only hiding the markers which aren't close to current location. I think hideOtherLocationMarkers conveys that in a better way.
